name: Heavenly Choir
description: Using your [Primary Ability Key] whilst equipped with any head will cast Heavenly Choir. Heavenly Choir will recall all heads and use a special ability on the blessed ones.

actions.command: execute as @e[distance=..64,tag=eagle] if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run power grant @s hypno:playstyle/hephaestus/cherubim/choir/eagle
execute as @e[distance=..64,tag=ox] if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run power grant @s hypno:playstyle/hephaestus/cherubim/choir/ox
execute as @e[distance=..64,tag=lion] if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run power grant @s hypno:playstyle/hephaestus/cherubim/choir/lion
execute as @e[distance=..64,type=!minecraft:armor_stand] if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run power remove @s hypno:playstyle/hephaestus/cherubim/eagle
execute as @e[distance=..64,type=!minecraft:armor_stand] if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run power remove @s hypno:playstyle/hephaestus/cherubim/ox
execute as @e[distance=..64,type=!minecraft:armor_stand] if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run power remove @s hypno:playstyle/hephaestus/cherubim/lion
execute as @e[distance=..64,type=!minecraft:armor_stand] if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run scoreboard players reset @s blessed
execute as @e[distance=..64,type=!minecraft:armor_stand] if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run scoreboard players reset @s blessed
execute as @e[distance=..64,type=!minecraft:armor_stand] if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run scoreboard players reset @s blessed
